item.title: Atari guarantees a fitness app that incorporates gamification
item.description: Atari, a company known for interactive entertainment, is launching Atari Fitâ„¢, a fitness app with gaming elements, in early 2015. Atari collaborated with certified personal trainer Michael Porter to create over 150 exercises for the app, including circuit training, running programs, and personalized routines. Users can earn points by exercising alone or with friends to unlock classic Atari games such as Pong, Centipede, and Super Breakout. Porter highlights that all exercise routines within Atari Fit are certified, ensuring their safety and effectiveness.
